thread.title: Eurozone recovery shows signs of petering out as stimulus fails to breathe life into factories
thread.title_full: Eurozone recovery shows signs of petering out as stimulus fails to breathe life into factories

author: Mehreen Khan
title: Eurozone recovery shows signs of petering out as stimulus fails to breathe life into factories
text: Eurozone recovery shows signs of petering out as stimulus fails to breathe life into factories Manufacturers in the single currency have another unremarkable month, prompting expectation of bumper QE No major economy showed signs of life in September
